articles.title: Building smarter Design Systems with AI
articles.intro: As a product designer, I've always believed in the power of design systems. They're the backbone of scalable, consistent digital products. A well-structured system saves time, reduces friction, and ensures that every element aligns perfectly across screens and teams.

articles.title: How I got started
articles.intro: I am going to use AI for this entire website project, from planning to design, coding and deployment. I started with the simplest of things - the website holding page. I wrote my first prompt, but quickly realised I needed to include more detail to get better results. In particular, how I wanted text to be classed and how it would scale for mobile.
